thread.section_title: KISA Phone Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of KISA Phone | kisaphone.com.au
thread.title: Melody Wallace
thread.title_full: KISA Phone reviewed by Melody Wallace

author: Melody Wallace
title: Melody Wallace
text: I have now dealt with Kisa three times after purchasing a phone for my elderly 96 year old Mum & they are just awesome. The phone is wonderful & Mum finds it so easy to use which is great.The customer service is fantastic, nothing is ever a problem & they are just so helpful & addressed my query each time immediately - I can't speak highly enough of this company & their team, thoroughly recommend them to friends & family & everyone :) Melody
